short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Oumu helps you learn Japanese by replacing words on websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Oumu helps you learn Japanese by replacing words on websites using vocabulary commonly found in books like the Genki series.

This is a very early version of the extension.
